function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increasing costs of compliance losing income or jobs leading to reduced capacity to comply","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lifting of restrictions leading to increased opportunities for non-compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compliance with lockdown measures influenced by fear of disease, moral support, and social norms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower self-control leading to non-compliance with lockdown measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concordance between self-reported and objective compliance measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sampling bias in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unobserved differences affecting study outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Response biases in self-reported compliance data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust in government and leaders influencing compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunity to violate measures leading to noncompliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impulsivity associated with noncompliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive association between social norms and compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No strict enforcement of covid-19 mitigation measures in the netherlands.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to comply with measures due to lack of resources or knowledge.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clarity about the covid-19 measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No relation between costs of compliance and compliant behavior","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation between negative emotions and compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation for severity of deterrence with compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relatively high self-reported compliance with coronavirus mitigation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to analyze changes in behavior due to single moment measurement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed results on the relationship between moral support for measures and compliant behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction that greater costs of compliance would predict less compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publication of non-peer-reviewed research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender and trust in science correlate with compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived threat, moral alignment, and impulsivity correlate with compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Descriptive social norms correlate with compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data analysis on compliance measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of control variables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of stepwise regressions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between compliance and perceived threat, specific moral alignment, negative emotions, and other factors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative correlation between compliance and opportunity to violate, impulsivity, and non-normative ool.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived fairness of law enforcement in creating and enforcing covid-19 mitigation norms for compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law in relation to covid-19 regulations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have low practical capacity to comply with covid-19 mitigation measures, as indicated by the measures of their ability to comply with the measures and the opportunity to violate them.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have limited knowledge of the current covid-19 mitigation measures, leading to non-compliance and misinformation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may perceive the covid-19 measures as unclear, leading to
